author: sandra_johnson
content: I have asked previously about block propagation times and for anyone else interested, I want to share an excellent resource I found. It is a conference paper in 2020 by Paulo Silva et al "Impact of Geo-Distribution and Mining Pools on Blockchains: A Study of Ethereum".  They data collected over a month. The datasets and their code used (Python) are available from Kaggle - links from their webpage https://angainor.science/ethmeasure
